description: Manage Jenkins jobs by using Jenkins REST API.

url.description: Url where the Jenkins server is accessible.

enabled.description: Whether the job should be enabled or disabled.

token.description: API token used to authenticate alternatively to password.

state.description: Attribute that specifies if the job has to be created or deleted.

user.description: User to authenticate with the Jenkins server.

password.description: Password to authenticate with the Jenkins server.
